title: The best team fights
body:
When everyone goes in, everyones out for blood, trying to get picks,throwing all their ults and summoners, spamming abilities and no one dies.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: i live for those kinds of fights, the best ones are when both teams clash blow there loads back off and only trade 1 for 1

It's pretty funny to think that you can find these kind of fights in an average normal game and (bloodless) bloodbaths involving LCK heavyweights. Especially when you consider the reason these fights end up the way they do has something to do with the fine line that separates dodging and missing : )
